title: User Review
subtitle: Review and approve user registration requests

errors.insufficientPermissions: You don't have permission to perform this action

confirm.approveContent: Are you sure you want to approve {{user}} with role {{role}}?
confirm.rejectContent: Are you sure you want to reject this user?
confirm.rejectWarning: This action cannot be undone and the user will need to register again.

notifications.userDescription: Your account has been approved with role: {{role}}
notifications.userRejectedDescription: Your account registration has been rejected. Please contact support for more information.
notifications.adminDescription: User {{user}} has been approved with role {{role}}

editModal.title: Edit User Settings
editModal.roleDescription: Assign a role to control user access
editModal.roleInfoDescription: The role determines the user's permissions and access scope.
editModal.permissionsDescription: Select the permissions to grant to the user.
editModal.provincesDescription: Select the provinces the user can access.
editModal.autoProvinceAccessDescription: This role will automatically have access to all provinces.
editModal.employeeProvinceNote: Employee will be assigned to province: {{province}}
editModal.confirmChanges: Please review and confirm the changes before saving.

guest.label: Guest
guest.description: Unauthenticated or limited access users with minimal permissions

pending.label: Pending
pending.description: Users awaiting approval with very limited access

user.label: Standard User
user.description: Standard authenticated users with basic permissions

lead.label: Team Lead
lead.description: Document reviewers and team leads with enhanced basic permissions

province_manager.label: Province Manager
province_manager.description: Province-level managers with higher intermediate permissions
